allow: Bash(.specify/scripts/powershell/create-new-feature.ps1 -Json "{""description"":""Define functional requirements for Integrated RAG Chatbot Development. Build and embed a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbot within the published Docusaurus book. Use OpenAI Agents/ChatKit SDKs, FastAPI backend, Neon Serverless Postgres for storage, Qdrant Cloud Free Tier for vector search. Chatbot must answer user questions on book''s content, including based only on user-selected text. Connect MCP context7 for latest docs. No tech stack details yet, just what and why for integration with book. Output spec.md only."",""number"":1,""shortName"":""rag-chatbot"",""action"":""create""}")
Bash(curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/query -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""query"":""What is humanoid robotics?""}")

Bash(python -c "
import ast
with open(''E:/Book/Humanoid-Book/backend/app.py'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    content = f.read()

try:
    tree = ast.parse(content)
    print(''Syntax is valid'')
except SyntaxError as e:
    print(f''Syntax error at line {e.lineno}: {e.msg}'')
    print(f''Line content: {content.splitlines()[e.lineno-1] if e.lineno <= len(content.splitlines()) else ""Line not found""}'')
")

Bash(.specify/scripts/powershell/create-new-feature.ps1 -Json "Generate spec.md for Panaversity Hackathon bonus features (up to 200 extra points). Implement:

- Logged user can personalize chapter content via button at chapter start (50 points): Adjust content based on user background
- Logged user can translate chapter to Urdu via button at chapter start (50 points)

- Logged user can personalize chapter content via button at chapter start (50 points): Adjust content based on user background
- Logged user can translate chapter to Urdu via button at chapter start (50 points)
Integrate seamlessly with existing Docusaurus book + RAG chatbot. Use MCP context7 + Spec-Kit Plus. Output only spec.md." --json --number 2 --short-name "user-personalization")
